vendors.name: Green Valley Farms
vendors.description: Organic fruits and vegetables grown with sustainable practices since 2010. Our family farm specializes in heirloom varieties and seasonal favorites.

vendors.name: Sunny Acres Honey
vendors.description: Local raw honey from our own beehives. We offer a variety of flavors based on seasonal blooms.

vendors.name: Bountiful Breads
vendors.description: Artisanal breads baked fresh daily using locally milled flour and natural leavening.

vendors.name: Happy Hen Eggs
vendors.description: Free-range eggs from pasture-raised chickens. Our hens enjoy plenty of space and sunshine!

vendors.name: Mountain View Cheese
vendors.description: Handcrafted cheeses made from local milk. We specialize in aged cheddars and fresh goat cheeses.

vendors.name: Berry Best Farms
vendors.description: Seasonal berries grown without synthetic pesticides. Pick your own available in season.

vendors.name: Heritage Pork Co.
vendors.description: Pasture-raised heritage breed pork. All animals are raised humanely with no antibiotics.

vendors.name: Crafted by Hand
vendors.description: Handmade pottery and woodworking items created by local artisans.

vendors.name: Sweet Blossom Jams
vendors.description: Small-batch jams and preserves made with local fruit and minimal sugar.

vendors.name: Fresh Catch Seafood
vendors.description: Locally caught fish and shellfish from sustainable fisheries.

vendors.name: Garden of Eden Herbs
vendors.description: Fresh and dried culinary herbs, medicinal plants, and herbal teas.

vendors.name: Flour Power
vendors.description: Specialty cakes, cookies, and pies made to order with local ingredients.

vendors.name: The Wooly Sheep
vendors.description: Handspun yarn and wool products from our own flock of sheep.

vendors.name: Urban Greens
vendors.description: Hydroponically grown lettuces and microgreens year-round.

vendors.name: Maplewood Syrup
vendors.description: Pure maple syrup tapped from our own sugar maple trees.
